website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, quality joystick that offers comfort and a good range of movement.
pros: Has four push buttons and one eight-way point of view hat
22 programmable functions with their Control Manager software
cons: Some had trouble getting this to work with USB
Joystick does not have a twist axis

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used CH products for many years and they have not disappointed. The Flightstick Pro has one big advantage over most other joy sticks. It is ambidextrous. I currently use two Flightstick Pro’s working together to provide all the functions required for a Combat Flight Simulation. They work great once the functions / combinations have been relegated to the subconscious. The only down side to using the two Flightstick Pro’s together is that some flight simulations will not recognize each joystick separately, thereby reducing available functions. As with all CH Products the Flightstick Pro is very well made. And, I do not work for CH! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kent Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great basic stick
customer_reviews.text: Use it for Flight Simulator X Steam Edition. You don't need a fancy yoke. The motion is good. It gives good feel to where the center is. Returns exactly to center if you release pressure. Buttons feel good. Just one thing, markings could be added to the trim and throttle wheels to show where the center of adjustment is, but I marked it with a paint pen.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality For Flight Sims
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Flightstick Pro for my flight simulators for as long as I can remember. I just bought one as a gift for my grandson so he can start into flight simming. This is truly a top quality stick that does not drift or need recalibration. It is a precision instrument that holds cal time after time and glides smoothly as it is moved from one position to another. You can't miss with this stick.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: If you need a simple "analog" joystick look no further, this is the one. The model hasn't been changed in years and there's a good reason for that; it's hard to improve. Sturdy, reliable, with a nice weight to it, and excellent driver that allows you to configure it together with other (CHP) controllers.

customer_reviews.title: Work well

The axis control consistency is good. The joystick works better for flight simulation programs than for space simulation games, though the later is helped by turning down the joystick sensitivity and being less heavy handed in button pressing. My only wish was that these were cheaper.
